title: Gunder Frank vs David Christian Secondary MCQ 3

content.question: The trade networks described by the two sources were most strongly influenced by

choices.label: increased Asian demand for food imports
increased European demand for luxury goods
increased Chinese maritime activity in the Indian Ocean
increased demand for precious metals within European colonies in the Americas

content.answer: increased European demand for luxury goods

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
